dlgLine.text: Friends, I have tried to be resonable, I have tried to make concessions, and I have overlooked oversights in judgment, but I think it's time we face facts - this place needs new ideas and I'm willing to give it the leadership it deserves.
<To you> I gave you a chance and I trusted you to make things right, and I'm sorry, but it's become clear that my faith was misplaced.

I'm willing to get this place in line. I'm the leader it deserves! There will be food, there will be safety, and most of all, we will finally get rid of the one person who has wrongly steered this place into the ground.
<To you>This is a serious proposal... If Sandy has overwhelming support, she will be elected as the rightful leader of this place.
The current morale around here tells me that...
I'm afraid the people here aren't going to accept a change of leadership right now.
Given their feelings about our current leadership, the people here would accept this change.
Sandy has experience in government...
But I don't think it applies here. I support <charname> as leader.
And I think we could use it. We need a change.
Let's see. Do I stand to gain anything from this...
No, I don't see this working out well for me.
I'm sure Sandy and I can come to an agreement.
Didn't think you had the ovaries, Sandy...
But this ain't the P.T.A. - I'm with <charname>.
I'm impressed. You got my vote.
Basing my vote on what people are telling me about the leadership here...
I believe the current leadership has more support.
I believe people will appreciate Sandy's leadership.
In this case, I think the law clearly supports one person's authority...
And that's <charname>.
And it's Sandy.
The votes have been cast...
The majority of the votes are in favor of removing you from the shelter.
And to show everyone that I can be tough but fair, I will personally see that my predecessor is given an extra few rations.
<To you> Don't make this harder than it already is - you lost fair and square.

dlgAnsw.text: Wait! Let's talk! Davis? Someone?! Don't throw me out!
Sandy in charge?! Good luck, fuckers - you'll all be dead in a week!
You sons of bitches! After all I did for you! I want a recount!

dlgLine.text: The majority of the votes are in favor of keeping you as leader.

dlgAnsw.text: Good... Then this meeting is over.
Not so fast, Sandy - I cannot let what you did go unpunished.

dlgLine.text: Despite what happened, I'm still committed to the people here ... I can still be of use to you and this shelter.

dlgAnsw.text: Hmm... You're lucky I still need you. For now, you can stay.
I'm going to shake hands, and I'm going to put this behind us. For the sake of the shelter.
If the people support you so much, they can feed you. No rations for a week.
For attempting mutiny against me, you will be exiled from this shelter immediately.
For your betrayal, I sentence you to death. To be carried immediately. <Kill Sandy>

dlgLine.text: It takes a lot of courage to do that. I appreciate it.
That's... that's exactly the kind of thing we need to hear more of around here.
This is really humbling... Let's let bygones be bygones - for the sake of the people here.
Well, I... at least you're willing to let me stay.
Well... at least give me a ride back to my house? To somewhere? You're not just going to let me rot out there, are you?! Well... if I die, it's on all of you!
<Sandy's body is nearly folded in two from the shot.>
...Traitors... all of you...

dlgAnsw.text: <Sandy is dragged out and the meeting is adjourned.>

dlgLine.text: I believe this meeting is over.

dlgAnsw.text: <You remain in control of the shelter.>
